text.name: info
text.text:
Manufacturer: Commodore International
Released: 1985
Models: A1000, A2000, A500, A3000, A500+, A600, A1200, A4000
Units sold: 4.85 million
OS: AmigaOS, Kickstart firmware
CPU: 16/32-bit Motorola 680x0 @ 7.09 MHz and higher
RAM: 256 KB and higher, expandable
Graphics: Denise (OCS) / HiRes Denise (ECS) / Lisa (AGA)
Sound: Paula, 4 channels, 8-bit stereo PCM
